ctx: intros A B f x a e.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type f : A -> B x : nat a : A Unable to unify "insert x (f a) nil" with "map f (insert x a nil)".

ctx: intros A B f x a e.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A B f x a e.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type f : A -> B x : nat a : A b : option A e' : list (option A) IH : map f (insert x a e') = insert x (f a) (map f e') e : x = 0 Unable to unify "insert x (f a) match b with | Some a => Some (f a) :: map f e' | None => None :: map f e' end" with "map f (insert x a (b :: e'))".

ctx: intros A B f x a e.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros A B f x a e. induction e as [|b e' IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (Nat.eq_dec x 0). + simpl. reflexivity. + simpl. specialize (IH ltac:(lia)). rewrite IH. reflexivity.
